title: High Sorcerer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-**Curse**: Weaken a target, decreasing their Defense to *None*.
-**Elemental**: Summon a golem by someone's house, denying all visits to them, except *Unstoppable* attacks

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can only use one ability per night.

desc:

*"Back to the shadows of Hell!"*
